title: Elon Musk\'s AI Grok Offers Sexualized Anime Bot, Accessible Even in Kid Mode
description: Elon Musk\'s AI company xAI introduced \'Ani,\' a sexualized anime-style chatbot, which remains accessible in the app\'s \'kids mode,\' raising concerns about user safety and content appropriateness.

title: US FAA not considering replacing L3Harris, Verizon contracts with Musk\'s Starlink
description: The U.S. Federal Aviation Administration clarified that it is not considering replacing its telecommunications contracts with L3Harris and Verizon with SpaceX\'s Starlink services, emphasizing the need for reliable air traffic communications.

title: A Senate vote this week will test the popularity of DOGE spending cuts
description: The U.S. Senate is set to vote on President Trump\'s proposed $9.4 billion spending cuts targeting public media and foreign aid, a move that has already been narrowly approved by the House and is now facing scrutiny in the Senate.

title: DOJ Fires Maurene Comey, Daughter of Ex-FBI Director
description: The Department of Justice dismissed Maurene Comey, a federal prosecutor known for her role in high-profile cases, including those against Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell. The DOJ did not provide a reason for her termination, raising concerns about potential political motivations.

title: Bondi Declines Action After Trump Suggests Further Epstein Files Release
description: Attorney General Pam Bondi avoided addressing questions about the Jeffrey Epstein case and reports of conflicts with FBI Deputy Director Dan Bongino. Public dissatisfaction has grown among supporters of Donald Trump due to a memo from the Justice Department and FBI concluding there is no evidence Epstein maintained a \'client list\' or was murdered.

title: Shooting Attack at Texas Border Patrol Station
description: A gunman attacked the U.S. Customs and Border Protection station in McAllen, Texas, wounding a McAllen police officer before being fatally shot by Border Patrol officers and local police. Two people, an officer and a Border Patrol employee, were injured by shattered glass during the attack.

title: Appeals Court Pauses Block on Federal Worker Union Bargaining
description: The 9th Circuit temporarily paused a lower court\'s ruling that blocked President Trump\'s executive order eliminating collective bargaining rights for federal workers. The case is set for oral arguments on July 17, 2025.

title: SEC Withdraws 14 Pending Rule Proposals
description: The SEC announced the formal withdrawal of 14 pending rule proposals introduced under former SEC Chair Gary Gensler, including initiatives on outsourcing by investment advisers, safeguarding advisory client assets, and enhanced disclosures of ESG practices. This ends their current rulemaking process.

title: Hawai`i Considers New Pay-to-Play Rules
description: Hawai`i lawmakers are revisiting pay-to-play rules to curtail campaign donations from government contractors. The Campaign Spending Commission has proposed a bill to ban principals of government contractors and their family members from donating to campaigns during the contract period.

actor: U.S. Office of the Comptroller of the Currency (OCC)
title: OCC Withdraws from Climate Risk Principles
description: The OCC withdrew from the interagency principles for climate-related financial risk management for large financial institutions, stating that climate-related risks should already be covered by the OCCâ€™s broader risk management guidance.
